languages.text: "Выдвигаю гипотезу. Данный конструкт является мобильной экзекуционной камерой. Объект иммобилизуется инструментарием конструкта, помещается в конструкт и подвергается сверх-мучительной утилизации посредством внедрения химикатов. Биологические останки после утилизации консервируются во встроенном резервуаре конструкта".

"Presenting a hypothesis. This construct is a mobile execution chamber. A subject is immobilised by the implements, placed inside the construct, and subjected to highly painful disposal via chemical injection. The biological remains are preserved in the built-in reservoir of the construct."
languages.original_text: "Выдвигаю гипотезу. Данный конструкт является мобильной экзекуционной камерой. Объект иммобилизуется инструментарием конструкта, помещается в конструкт и подвергается сверх-мучительной утилизации посредством внедрения химикатов. Биологические останки после утилизации консервируются во встроенном резервуаре конструкта".

traits.locale_text: "Presenting a hypothesis. This construct is a mobile execution chamber. A target is immobilized by the implements, is placed inside the construct and is subjected to a highly painful disposal by means of a chemical injection. Following utilization, the biological remains of the target are preserved in the built-in reservoir of the construct."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

Following utilization, the biological remains of the target are preserved in the built-in reservoir of the construct."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「思うに…この構造物は移動式処刑室だ。被験者は器具で固定され、構造物の中に入れられ、化学注射によってかなりの苦痛を伴う処刑を受ける。生物学的残骸は、構造物に内蔵されたリザーバーに保存されるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Presenting a hypothesis. This construct is a mobile execution chamber. A subject is immobilised by the implements, placed inside the construct, and subjected to highly painful disposal via chemical injection. The biological remains are preserved in the built-in reservoir of the construct."

traits.locale_text: 「思うに…この構造物は移動式処刑室だ。被験者は器具で固定され、構造物の中に入れられ、化学注射によってかなりの苦痛を伴う処刑を受ける。生物学的残骸は、構造物に内蔵されたリザーバーに保存されるんだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “提出假设：这台机器是一座移动的行刑室。实验对象会被这些工具固定住，放置在机器内部，之后接受化学注射，遭受极其痛苦的行刑过程。实验对象被处理结束之后，残留的生物质会保存在机器内部的储存库中。”
languages.original_text: "Presenting a hypothesis. This construct is a mobile execution chamber. A subject is immobilised by the implements, placed inside the construct, and subjected to highly painful disposal via chemical injection. The biological remains are preserved in the built-in reservoir of the construct."

traits.locale_text: “提出假设：这台机器是一座移动的行刑室。实验对象会被这些工具固定住，放置在机器内部，之后接受化学注射，遭受极其痛苦的行刑过程。实验对象被处理结束之后，残留的生物质会保存在机器内部的储存库中。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Presentando una hipótesis. Este constructo es una cámara de ejecución móvil. Un sujeto es inmovilizado por los instrumentos, colocado dentro del constructo y sometido a una eliminación altamente dolorosa mediante una inyección química. Los restos biológicos se conservan en el depósito incorporado del constructo».
languages.original_text: "Presenting a hypothesis. This construct is a mobile execution chamber. A subject is immobilised by the implements, placed inside the construct, and subjected to highly painful disposal via chemical injection. The biological remains are preserved in the built-in reservoir of the construct."

traits.locale_text: «Presentando una hipótesis. Este constructo es una cámara de ejecución móvil. Un sujeto es inmovilizado por los instrumentos, colocado dentro del constructo y sometido a una eliminación altamente dolorosa mediante una inyección química. Tras su utilización, los restos biológicos del objetivo se conservan en el depósito incorporado del constructo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hypothese: Dieses Konstrukt ist eine mobile Hinrichtungskammer. Eine Person wird durch die Vorrichtungen gelähmt, in das Konstrukt gesperrt und einer ausgesprochen schmerzhaften Entsorgung mittels chemischer Injektion unterzogen. Die biologischen Überreste werden im integrierten Reservoir des Konstruktes aufbewahrt."
languages.original_text: "Presenting a hypothesis. This construct is a mobile execution chamber. A subject is immobilised by the implements, placed inside the construct, and subjected to highly painful disposal via chemical injection. The biological remains are preserved in the built-in reservoir of the construct."

traits.locale_text: "Hypothese: Dieses Konstrukt ist eine mobile Hinrichtungskammer. Eine Person wird durch die Vorrichtungen bewegungsunfähig gemacht, in das Konstrukt gesperrt und einer extrem schmerzvollen Entsorgung mittels Injektion einer Chemikalie unterzogen. Die biologischen Überreste des Ziels werden im eingebauten Reservoir des Konstrukts bewahrt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Hypothèse : cette machine est une chambre d'exécution mobile. Le sujet est immobilisé par les instruments, placé à l'intérieur de la machine, puis soumis à une exécution extrêmement douloureuse par le biais d'une injection chimique. Les vestiges biologiques sont ensuite préservés dans le réservoir intégré de la machine. »
languages.original_text: "Presenting a hypothesis. This construct is a mobile execution chamber. A subject is immobilised by the implements, placed inside the construct, and subjected to highly painful disposal via chemical injection. The biological remains are preserved in the built-in reservoir of the construct."

traits.locale_text: « Hypothèse : cette machine est une chambre d'exécution mobile. Le sujet est immobilisé par les instruments, placé à l'intérieur de la machine, puis soumis à une exécution extrêmement douloureuse par le biais d'une injection chimique. Les vestiges biologiques du sujet sont ensuite préservés dans le réservoir intégré de la machine. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bir hipotez sunuyorum. Bu yapı, hareketli bir infaz odası. Özne; çeşitli gereçlerle hareketsiz hâle getiriliyor, yapının içine yerleştiriliyor ve kimyasal enjeksiyonlarla son derece acılı bir şekilde atığa dönüştürülüyor. Biyolojik kalıntılar, yapıya entegre haznede ihtiva ediliyor."
languages.original_text: "Presenting a hypothesis. This construct is a mobile execution chamber. A subject is immobilised by the implements, placed inside the construct, and subjected to highly painful disposal via chemical injection. The biological remains are preserved in the built-in reservoir of the construct."

traits.locale_text: "Bir hipotez sunuyorum. Bu yapı, hareketli bir infaz odası. Özne, çeşitli gereçlerle hareketsiz hâle getiriliyor, yapının içine yerleştiriliyor, kimyasal enjeksiyonlarla son derece acılı bir şekilde atığa dönüştürülüyor. Biyolojik kalıntılar, yapıya entegre haznede ihtiva ediliyor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
